Function.Description: The deleteRows function deletes the specified number of old rows including the specified row.

Brief.Overview: The deleteRows function deletes the specified number of old rows including the specified row.
Brief.Usage: Use the deleteRows function to delete old rows from a Brick object. The old rows will be deleted just at the specified deletion row.

Argument.Name: aBrick
Argument.Note: The Brick object from which rows will be deleted.

Argument.Name: rowNum
Argument.Note: The row number where deleteRow will start deleting the rows.

Argument.Name: rowCount
Argument.Note: The number of new rows to be deleted.
